entries.meaning: A comb or brush, having rubber or plastic teeth, used to groom horses.
examples: One hundred currycombs  […]  One hundred corn horsebrushes  […]

verbs.description: currycomb (third-person singular simple present currycombs, present participle currycombing, simple past and past participle currycombed)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To groom using such a comb.
